articles.description: SEATTLE (WKRC) - You may have seen the 90-year-old Seattle woman who walked six miles total -- in the snow -- to get a COVID-19 vaccine. Her name is Fran Goldman, and she actually lived in Cincinnati for 60 years! Goldman was a docent at the Taft Museum, a ph…
